mapper.insert: insert into core_data.shippers (id, code, name, phone, description, created_by, updated_by, isactive, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp) values (#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{description}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{isactive,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdTimestamp}, #{updatedTimestamp})
mapper.update: update core_data.shippers set code = #{code}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, description = #{description}, created_by = #{createdBy}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, isactive = #{isactive,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_timestamp = #{createdTimestamp}, updated_timestamp = #{updatedTimestamp} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, code, name, phone, description, created_by, updated_by, isactive, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp from core_data.shippers where id = #{id}
select id, code, name, phone, description, created_by, updated_by, isactive, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp from core_data.shippers
